meanings.definition: The removal of an amino group from a molecule.
meanings.sent1: During deamination, the amino group is taken away from the molecule.
meanings.sent2: Deamination is an important chemical process in biochemistry.
meanings.sent3: The molecule felt lighter after the deamination party!
meanings.sent4: In the laboratory of life, deamination acts as a molecular sculptor.
meanings.sent5: The deamination process is like a tiny molecular surgery.

meanings.definition: The process of breaking down amino acids in the body.
meanings.sent1: The body relies on deamination to break down amino acids efficiently.
meanings.sent2: Deamination plays a crucial role in the digestion of proteins.
meanings.sent3: The deamination dance party in the body never stops!
meanings.sent4: In the body's orchestra, deamination is the conductor of amino acid breakdown.
meanings.sent5: The deamination process in the body is like a busy recycling center.
